visual.name: advanceCard
visual.description: Advance card visual with more options than default card visual available in Power BI

dataRoles.name: mainMeasure
dataRoles.description: Put main data label field here.

dataRoles.name: tooltipMeasures
dataRoles.description: All fields present here will be used to display as a tooltip on card when 'Show Tooltip' option is enabled.

dataRoles.name: conditionMeasure
dataRoles.description: If you want to use conditional formatting by different field, put that here otherwise leave it empty.

dataRoles.name: prefixMeasure
dataRoles.description: Put prefix field here. If you want constant text as a prefix then add it through prefix settings in format pane.

dataRoles.name: postfixMeasure
dataRoles.description: Put postfix field here. If you want constant text as a postfix then add it through postfix settings in format pane.

general.description: General Power BI settings with extra Advance Card related settings such as alignment of card content.

alignmentSpacing.description: Specify spacing in px from left or right border when alignment is set to either left or right.

alignment.description: Align the content of the card to either left, right or center.

dataLabelSettings.description: Format settings to modify look and feel of the data label value for which value comes from 'Data field'.

color.description: Default color of the data label. If you are using conditional formatting and no condition is satisfied, then this color will be visible.

decimalPlaces.description: Specify decimal places for decimal number.

fontSize.description: Specify font size for data label.

fontFamily.description: Specify font family for data label.

enumeration.value: "Segoe UI Bold", wf_segoe-ui_bold, helvetica, arial, sans-serif
"Segoe UI Light", wf_segoe-ui_bold, helvetica, arial, sans-serif

categoryLabelSettings.description: Format settings to modify look and feel of the category label for which value comes from display name of the data field.

color.description: Default color of the category label. If you are using conditional formatting and no condition is satisfied, then this color will be visible.

fontSize.description: Specify font size for category label.

fontFamily.description: Specify font family for category label.

enumeration.value: "Segoe UI Bold", wf_segoe-ui_bold, helvetica, arial, sans-serif
"Segoe UI Light", wf_segoe-ui_bold, helvetica, arial, sans-serif

text.description: Specify the text that needs to be shown in prefix label. If no prefix field is specified in Fields pane, then this text will be visible.

color.description: Default color of the prefix label. If you are using conditional formatting and no condition is satisfied, then this color will be visible.

spacing.description: Spacing between prefix label and data label in px.

fontSize.description: Specify font size for prefix label.

fontFamily.description: Specify font family for prefix label.

enumeration.value: "Segoe UI Bold", wf_segoe-ui_bold, helvetica, arial, sans-serif
"Segoe UI Light", wf_segoe-ui_bold, helvetica, arial, sans-serif

text.description: Specify the text that needs to be shown in postfix label. If no postfix field is specified in Fields pane, then this text will be visible.

color.description: Default color of the postfix label. If you are using conditional formatting and no condition is satisfied, then this color will be visible.

spacing.description: Spacing between postfix label and data label in px.

fontSize.description: Specify font size for postfix label.

fontFamily.description: Specify font family for postfix label.

enumeration.value: "Segoe UI Bold", wf_segoe-ui_bold, helvetica, arial, sans-serif
"Segoe UI Light", wf_segoe-ui_bold, helvetica, arial, sans-serif

backgroundSettings.description: Show background color in card. This needs to ENABLE if you are using background color in CONDITIONAL formatting.

backgroundColor.description: Default color for background. If you are using conditional formatting and no condition is satisfied, then this color will be visible.

showImage.description: Enable this to show image specified in Image URL in card background.

imagePadding.description: Specify image padding in px from the border.

strokeSettings.description: Enable this to display various types of stroke or border around the card.

strokeArray.description: Used in when stroke type is dashed. E.g. values 5,10,5,2 10,2,1,10 etc. Play with to find required result.

strokeWidth.description: Specify width in px of the stroke.

cornerRadius.description: Radius of corner in px when any of the following is enable.

topLeftInward.description: Make top left corner round and make it inward.

topRightInward.description: Make top right corner round and make it inward.

bottomLeftInward.description: Make bottom left corner round and make it inward.

bottomRightInward.description: Make bottom right corner round and make it inward.

conditionSettings.description: Settings used for conditional formatting. Enable 'Fill' if you are going to use background color in conditional formatting.

conditionNumbers.description: Specify number of conditions you want to use. Max 10 conditions you can specify.

applyToDataLabel.description: Should conditional formatting apply to data label?

applyToCategoryLabel.description: Should conditional formatting apply to category label?

applyToPrefix.description: Should conditional formatting apply to prefix label?

applyToPostfix.description: Should conditional formatting apply to postfix label?

tootlipSettings.description: Enable this to show tooltip on Advance Card. Value for tooltip comes from 'Tooltip fields' in fields pane.

aboutSettings.description: Information related to Advance Card such as version, help url and other useful links.

version.description: Version of the Advance Card that you are using.

helpUrl.description: URL for general guidelines. Detailed documentaion available on GitHub.
